verses.verse: Praise<WH1288> Yahweh,<WH3068> my soul!<WH5315> All that is within<WH7130> me,<WH6944> praise his holy name!<WH8034>
Praise<WH1288> Yahweh,<WH3068> my soul,<WH5315> and don't<WH7911> forget all his benefits;<WH1576>
who forgives<WH5545> all your sins;<WH5771> who heals<WH7495> all your diseases;<WH8463>
who redeems<WH1350> your life<WH2416> from destruction;<WH7845> who crowns<WH5849> you with loving kindness<WH2617> and tender mercies;<WH7356>
who satisfies<WH7646> your desire<WH5716> with good<WH2896> things,<WH5271> so that your youth is renewed<WH2318> like the eagle<WH5404>'s.
Yahweh<WH3068> executes<WH6213> righteous<WH6666> acts,<WH4941> and justice for all who are oppressed.<WH6231>
He made known<WH3045> his ways<WH1870> to Moses,<WH4872> his deeds<WH5949> to the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
Yahweh<WH3068> is merciful<WH7349> and gracious,<WH2587> slow<WH750> to anger,<WH639> and abundant<WH7227> in loving kindness.<WH2617>
He will not always<WH5331> accuse;<WH7378> neither will he stay<WH5201> angry forever.<WH5769>
He has not dealt<WH6213> with us according to our sins,<WH2399> nor repaid<WH1580> us for our iniquities.<WH5771>
For as the heavens<WH8064> are high above<WH1361> the earth,<WH776> so great<WH1396> is his loving kindness<WH2617> toward those who fear him.<WH3373>
As far as<WH7368> the east<WH4217> is from the west,<WH4628> so far has he removed<WH7368> our transgressions from us.<WH6588>
Like a father<WH1> has compassion<WH7355> on his children,<WH1121> so Yahweh<WH3068> has compassion<WH7355> on those who fear him.<WH3373>
For he knows<WH3045> how we are made.<WH3336> He remembers<WH2142> that we are dust.<WH6083>
As for man,<WH582> his days<WH3117> are like grass.<WH2682> As a flower<WH6731> of the field,<WH7704> so he flourishes.<WH6692>
For the wind<WH7307> passes over<WH5674> it,<WH4725> and it is gone. Its place remembers it no more.<WH5234>

But Yahweh<WH3068>'s loving kindness<WH2617> is from everlasting<WH5769> to<WH5704> everlasting<WH5769> with those who fear<WH3373> him,<WH6666> his righteousness to children<WH1121>'s children;<WH1121>
to those who keep<WH8104> his covenant,<WH1285> to those who remember<WH2142> to obey<WH6213> his precepts.<WH6490>
Yahweh<WH3068> has established<WH3559> his throne<WH3678> in the heavens.<WH8064> His kingdom<WH4438> rules over all.<WH4910>
Praise<WH1288> Yahweh,<WH3068> you angels<WH4397> of his,<WH1368> who are mighty in strength,<WH3581> who fulfill<WH6213> his word,<WH1697> obeying<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of his word.<WH1697>
Praise<WH1288> Yahweh,<WH3068> all you armies<WH6635> of his,<WH8334> you servants of his,<WH6213> who do his pleasure.<WH7522>
Praise<WH1288> Yahweh,<WH3068> all you works<WH4639> of his,<WH4725> in all places of his dominion.<WH4475> Praise<WH1288> Yahweh,<WH3068> my soul!<WH5315>
